name: @invertase/react-native-apple-authentication
author: Invertase <oss@invertase.io> (http://invertase.io)
description: A complete Apple Authentication services API for React Native iOS apps.

scripts.build:all: yarn build:clean && yarn build && yarn example:build:android && yarn example:build:ios
scripts.build:clean: rimraf ios/build android/build example/android/app/build example/ios/build example-old/macos/build example-old/visionos/build
scripts.example:prepare: cd example && yarn && cd ios && (pod install || true)
scripts.example:other:prepare: cd example-other && yarn && cd macos && (pod install || true) && cd ../visionos && (pod install || true)
scripts.example:build:ios: cd example && (xcodebuild -workspace ios/RNAppleAuthExample.xcworkspace -scheme RNAppleAuthExample -configuration Debug -sdk iphonesimulator -derivedDataPath ios/build -UseModernBuildSystem=YES | xcbeautify || true)
scripts.example:other:build:macos: cd example-other && (xcodebuild -workspace macos/RNAppleAuthExample.xcworkspace -configuration Debug -scheme RNAppleAuthExample | xcbeautify || true)
scripts.example:other:build:visionos: cd example-other && (xcodebuild -workspace visionos/RNAppleAuthExample.xcworkspace -scheme RNAppleAuthExample -configuration Debug | xcbeautify || true)
